ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Principal_Order__c , '')&& ISPICKVAL(Fees_Order__c , '') && ISPICKVAL(Insurance_Order__c, '') && ISPICKVAL(Interest_Order__c , '') , FALSE , ( TEXT( Principal_Order__c ) == TEXT( Fees_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Principal_Order__c ) == TEXT( Insurance_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Principal_Order__c ) == TEXT( Interest_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Fees_Order__c ) == TEXT( Insurance_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Fees_Order__c ) == TEXT( Interest_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Insurance_Order__c ) == TEXT( Interest_Order__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ensure each Payment element has a unique priority number between 1 and 4
